languages.text: {n}Перед вами, похоже, владыка малой династии ксеносов. Он явно принадлежит к культу разрушения, страстно ненавидящему плотскую жизнь. Однако, как бы ни был он похож на ожившую металлическую статую, когда-то он был живым существом, и идеалы служения и битвы, которыми он руководствовался тогда, существуют в его разуме до сих пор.{/n}

{n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами, похоже, владыка малой династии ксеносов. Он явно принадлежит к культу разрушения, страстно ненавидящему плотскую жизнь. Однако, как бы ни был он похож на ожившую металлическую статую, когда-то он был живым существом, и идеалы служения и битвы, которыми он руководствовался тогда, существуют в его разуме до сих пор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It appears that you're looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of these xenos. He's clearly a member of a destructive cult that harbours a passionate hatred of living flesh. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

{n}It appears that you're looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of these xenos. He's clearly a member of a destructive cult that harbours a passionate hatred of living flesh. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

{n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

{n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'être qui se tient devant vous est apparemment le tétrarque d'une dynastie mineure de xénos. Il s'agit manifestement d'un membre d'un clan destructeur qui exècre viscéralement la chair vivante. Toutefois, même s'il ressemble à une statue métallique animée, il était autrefois un être vivant, et les idéaux de devoir et de bravoure qui le guidaient subsistent encore dans son esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'être qui se tient devant vous est apparemment le tétrarque d'une dynastie mineure de xénos. Il s'agit manifestement d'un membre d'un clan destructeur qui exècre viscéralement la chair vivante. Toutefois, même s'il ressemble à une statue métallique animée, il était autrefois un être vivant, et les idéaux de devoir et de bravoure qui le guidaient subsistent encore dans son esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que estás ante el señor supremo de una dinastía menor de los xenos. Es claramente miembro de un culto destructivo que aborrece la carne viva con una pasión visceral. Sin embargo, por mucho que se parezca a una estatua metálica viviente, en su día era un ser vivo y los ideales de deber y valor que le guiaban aún perduran en su mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que estás ante el señor supremo de una dinastía menor de los xenos. Es claramente miembro de un culto destructivo que aborrece la carne viva con una pasión visceral. Sin embargo, por mucho que se parezca a una estatua metálica viviente, en su día era un ser vivo y los ideales de deber y valor que le guiaban aún perduran en su mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你眼前的这个异形，很可能是某个小型异形王朝的统治者。很显然，他是某个邪教的成员，他的邪教崇拜破坏，对活生生的肉体怀着发自内心的痛恨。尽管他看起来像是一具活过来的金属雕像，但他以前也曾是活生生的生物。他过去对责任与勇气的理想，依然植根于他的心灵身处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前的这个异形，很可能是某个小型异形王朝的统治者。很显然，他是某个邪教的成员，他的邪教崇拜破坏，对活生生的肉体怀着发自内心的痛恨。尽管他看起来像是一具活过来的金属雕像，但他以前也曾是活生生的生物。他过去对责任与勇气的理想，依然植根于他的心灵身处。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが見ているのは、異種族の小さな王朝の支配者のようだ。明らかに破壊的な教団の一員であり、生身の人間を心から嫌悪している。しかし、金属製の彫像のごとき姿であっても、彼はかつて生きていた存在であり、その心の中にはかつて彼を導いた義務と武勇の理想がまだ存在している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが見ているのは、異種族の小さな王朝の支配者のようだ。明らかに破壊的な教団の一員であり、生身の人間を心から嫌悪している。しかし、金属製の彫像のごとき姿であっても、彼はかつて生きていた存在であり、その心の中にはかつて彼を導いた義務と武勇の理想がまだ存在している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast wohl den Herrscher einer niederen Dynastie der Xenos vor dir. Er ist unverkennbar Mitglied eines destruktiven Kults, der lebendes Fleisch mit tiefsitzender Leidenschaft verabscheut. So sehr er aber auch einer belebten metallischen Statue ähnelt, er war einst ein Lebewesen, und die Ideale von Pflicht und Tugend, die früher seine Leitbilder waren, existieren in seinem Verstand noch immer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast wohl den Herrscher einer niederen Dynastie der Xenos vor dir. Er ist unverkennbar Mitglied eines destruktiven Kults, der lebendes Fleisch mit tiefsitzender Leidenschaft verabscheut. So sehr er aber auch einer belebten metallischen Statue ähnelt, er war einst ein Lebewesen, und die Ideale von Pflicht und Tugend, die früher seine Leitbilder waren, existieren in seinem Verstand noch immer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Küçük bir zeno hanedanlığının efendisine bakıyor gibisin. Yaşayan etlerden ilkel bir tutkuyla nefret eden, yıkıcı bir tarikatın üyesi olduğu çok bariz. Fakat hareketli metal bir heykele benzese de eskiden yaşayan bir varlıktı. Bir zamanlar ona yön veren görev ve şan idealleri, hâlâ zihninde bir yerde olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You appear to be looking at the overlord of a minor dynasty of the xenos. He is clearly a member of a destructive cult that loathes living flesh with a visceral passion. However, as much as he resembles an animated metallic statue, he was once a living being, and the ideals of duty and valour that used to guide him still exist in his mind.{/n}
